encumbranceBarClient.name: Encumbrance Tracker
encumbranceBarClient.hint: Toggle whether to show the encumbrance tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet.

encumbranceBarWorld.name: Encumbrance Tracker (Global Override)
encumbranceBarWorld.hint: Toggle whether to show the encumbrance tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet (Overrides client setting).

customSkillMenu.name: Manage Custom Skills
customSkillMenu.label: Custom Skills
customSkillMenu.hint: Allows you to add custom skills to the Cosmere RPG system.

customCurrencyMenu.name: Manage Custom Currencies
customCurrencyMenu.label: Custom Currency
customCurrencyMenu.hint: Allows you to add custom currencys to the Cosmere RPG system.

trackedCompendiumsMenu.name: Manage Tracked Compendiums
trackedCompendiumsMenu.label: Tracked Compendiums
trackedCompendiumsMenu.hint: Allows you to manage which compendiums are tracked by the compendium browser.

base.label: Base Unit
base.desc: Indicates this is used as the base unit for conversion rate.
